p: Once the blood perfusion of the anastomosed vessels was disturbed, it will greatly increase the risk of anastomotic leakage. Surgeons should pay attention to preventing thrombosis. Intra-operative anticoagulation therapy should be implemented with diluted heparin (5000 U/single dose), post-operative anticoagulation therapy with low molecular weight heparin (4000 AxaIU/qd), and followed by aspirin (100 mg/qd) for 1 year ( Supplementary Table 1).
